message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.DS, cs.IR, cs.SI 

This paper deals with text classification and visualization using topological data analysis, which is a combination of techniques from computer science, mathematics, and statistics. The paper specifically focuses on applying TDA to NLP, which falls under the category of computational linguistics (cs.CL). The paper also involves machine learning techniques, which are commonly used in the sub-category of machine learning (cs.LG). Additionally, the paper involves data analysis and visualization, which can be categorized under data science (cs.DS) and information retrieval (cs.IR). Finally, the paper involves the use of novel techniques for analyzing complex data, which can be categorized under the sub-category of scientific computing (cs.SI).
